name: The Cylinder Occasional Table - Davidson
description: The Cylinder Occasional  Table forms part of the vibrant Wanderlust Collection and is a sleek example of contemporary British furniture design. This chic piece is ideal for those who want to inject a burst of colour and is available in a wide range of different shades to create different moods in high gloss and satin. These tables also look incredibly smart in any of Davidson's signature timber finishes. The table comes in a standard size specifically designed for use as the cylinder occasional table. Bespoke sizes are also available upon request. Always with a keen eye for detail, the smooth slim table top is rounded, all standing on a stylish cylinder base.
